channel.title: 404 not found error in backend api unittest
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
I did unittests of redash without docker. Two envrionemnts variables are exported. REDASH_COOKIE_SECRET, REDASH_DATABASE_URL
But most results were 404 not found. Is there any environment variables related to unittest in backend side?
Regards, Cinyoung
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 11.0.0-dev * Browser/OS: Chrome / Ubuntu 20.04 * How did you install Redash: source install

item.title: 404 not found error in backend api unittest
item.dc:creator: hurcy
item.description:
Issue Summary

I did unittests of redash without docker.
Two envrionemnts variables are exported.
REDASH_COOKIE_SECRET, REDASH_DATABASE_URL

But most results were 404 not found.
Is there any environment variables related to unittest in backend side?

Regards,
Cinyoung

Technical details:

  • Redash Version: 11.0.0-dev
  • Browser/OS: Chrome / Ubuntu 20.04
  • How did you install Redash: source install
